Value.label: Range test after double click
Value.Help: Allows enabling the activation of Z-Wave range test with double click of a Tamper Switch 2.

Value.label: Group 2 Association Triggers
Value.Help: This parameter defines events that result in sending On/Off commands to devices added to the 2nd Association Group. These commands are sent alternately to switch the devices On and Off. Commands represent the values of BASIC SET command frames. This parameter is inactive in external dry-contact mode (parameter “Operation Mode” set to 1).

Value.label: Commands sent to associated devices on Group 2
Value.Help: Command frames sent to devices added to the 2nd association group.

Value.label: Values of ON command frame sent to Group 2 Association
Value.Help: The value of 0 turns OFF the device, 255 turns it On. In the case of associating the Dimmer or Roller Shutter module, values Values possible : 0 - 99 allow setting an Associated device to a specified level (0 is OFF) 255 is On

Value.label: Values of OFF command frame sent to Group 2 Association
Value.Help: The value of 0 turns OFF the device, 255 turns it On. In the case of associating the Dimmer or Roller Shutter module, values Values possible : 0 - 99 allow setting an Associated device to a specified level (0 is OFF) 255 is On

Value.label: Time Delay of ON command from Group #2
Value.Help: The time period after which ON command frame will be sent.

Value.label: Time Delay of OFF command from Group #2
Value.Help: The time period after which OFF command frame will be sent.

Value.label: Delay of tamper alarm cancellation.
Value.Help: The time period after which a tamper alarm will be canceled.
